title: Wen Token: Knowing When and How to Decentralize
description:
I would plan to cover the following topics:
(1) What are the right reasons to launch a token? When is a token additive vs extractive to a protocol and its community?
(2) When is the Right Time to Launch a Token? Many projects rush to launch a token when the market is hot, and this can be an irreversible mistake. 
(3) What are the nuts and bolts people should think about when launching a token? Offshore structures, marketing making?!
(4) Finally, what are the legal considerations?
